results.title: Evaluation of PEN2-ATP6AP1 axis as an antiparasitic target for metformin based on phylogeny analysis and molecular docking.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: These findings revealed the potential mechanisms by which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ treats various @<m>DISEASE_Parasitic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010272 @@@parasitic diseases@@@, and shed new light on the development of antiparasitic drugs.

citations.NLM: Liu C, Zhang S, Xue J, Zhang H, Yin J. Evaluation of PEN2-ATP6AP1 axis as an antiparasitic target for metformin based on phylogeny analysis and molecular docking. Mol Biochem Parasitol. 2023 Jul 18;255():111580. PMID: 37473813

results.title: Evaluation of metformin's effect on the adult and juvenile stages of Schistosoma mansoni: an in-vitro study.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@), a well-known anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug with a potent autophagy induction property, has been proven to be effective against several @<m>DISEASE_Parasitic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010272 @@@parasitic diseases@@@.

citations.NLM: Abdel Menaem HN, Hanafy MA, Abou El Dahab M, Mohamed KESK. Evaluation of metformin's effect on the adult and juvenile stages of Schistosoma mansoni: an in-vitro study. J Parasit Dis. 2025 Mar;49(1):69-83. PMID: 39975621

results.title: Immune cell arrival kinetics to peritoneum and role during murine-experimental trichomoniasis.
results.text_hl: Increased viability of @SPECIES_5722 @@@T. vaginalis@@@ was observed when the NETs inhibitors, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cl_amidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C558727 @@@Cl- amidine@@@, were administrated, highlighting the importance of this mechanism to control @<m>DISEASE_Parasitic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010272 @@@parasite infection@@@ (43 and 86%, respectively).

citations.NLM: Rangel-Mata FJ, Ávila-Muro EE, Reyes-Martínez JE, Olmos-Ortiz LM, Brunck ME, Arriaga-Pizano LA, Cuéllar-Mata P. Immune cell arrival kinetics to peritoneum and role during murine-experimental trichomoniasis. Parasitology. 2021 Nov;148(13):1624-1635. PMID: 35060469
